title: Incorrect 'Build' popup action enablement
description: The 'Build' action in the context-sensitive popup menu in the Java perspective is always enabled, even if the user selects 'Perform build automatically on resource modification' in Preferences > Workbench. This behavior is incorrect.
OB: The 'Build' action is always enabled in the Java popup menus in the Java perspective, regardless of whether the user has selected automatic build in Preferences > Workbench.
EB: The 'Build' action should not be enabled in the Java popup menus if the user has selected automatic build in Preferences > Workbench.
SR:
1. Open the Java perspective.
2. Go to Preferences > Workbench.
3. Select 'Perform build automatically on resource modification'.
4. Open a file in the project.
5. Verify that the 'Build' action is not enabled in the context-sensitive popup menu for the file.
